recipes.name: Grilled Cheese
instructions: Evenly spead mayonaisse on one side of both pieces of bread.
Place one piece of bread mayonaisse side down on pan.
Layer cheese on top of bread and second peice of bread on top of cheese, mayonaisse side up.
Cook for 2 minutes, flip, cook an additional 2 minute, then enjoy!
recipes.comments: A grownup taste of your childhood.

recipes.name: Peanut Butter and Jelly
ingredients: 2 Slices soft bread (like white, oatmeal, or whole grain)
2 tbsp jelly or jam (pick your flavor)
instructions: spread peanut butter on one slice of bread
spread jelly on the other slice of bread
fold slices together (spreads facing each other)
cut in half or diagonal if preferred
recipes.comments: the perfect yin and yang combo!
